item.description:
That's right! It's Patriot Day! (Not to be confused with Patriot's Day!)

RedPint (www.redpint.com) is sponsoring this event -- which means 12 lucky meetup members get one free hot dog just for attending.* But we're not talking about any ol' hot dog here. We're talking about pure beef, 100% take-me-out-to-the-ball-game American goodness hot dogs. And at one one fine beer bar in Boston, too!

Join us and get ready to chow down on some dogs (or choose from their other options, including vegetarian) while we partake in craft beer on Patriot's Day and the day the Red Sox play the Oakland A's (away game).

Meetup starts at 5:30 p.m.
Game starts at 9 p.m.
Hot dogs served all day long!

Cheers,
Alicia

*Each person gets a free $2 dog. Extras are, well, extra. Lower Depths serves up some mean hot-dog fixings, too -- including mac 'n cheese, spicy mustard and sauerkraut -- that a worth the extra dollar or two. If you don't order a dog, your $2 will be applied toward the table's grand total.
item.how_to_find_us: We're agile -- so get there on time to snag your spot.
item.name: Hot Dogs, Beer & Baseball on Patriot Day
